product_name: Timex Ironman Run x20 GPS Watch - Women's
long_description: Weighing less than 2 oz., this sporty GPS watch for women features an easy-to-read display with run-friendly menus, letting you quickly track and assess workout stats without slowing your stride.
short_description: Weighing less than 2 oz., this sporty GPS watch for women features an easy-to-read display with run-friendly menus, letting you quickly track and assess workout stats without slowing your stride.
